mapper.sql: SKU_ID , SPU_ID, SKU_NAME, SKU_INTRO, SKU_PRICE, SKU_CODE, SKU_BARCODE, SKU_STOCK, SKU_UNIT, SKU_UNIT_NAME, PRICE, VIP_PRICE, `STATUS`, MAIN_IMAGE_01, MAIN_IMAGE_02, MAIN_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_01, SUB_IMAGE_02, SUB_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_04, SUB_IMAGE_05, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into TB_SKU (SKU_ID, SPU_ID, SKU_NAME, SKU_INTRO, SKU_PRICE, SKU_CODE, SKU_BARCODE, SKU_STOCK, SKU_UNIT, SKU_UNIT_NAME, PRICE, VIP_PRICE, `STATUS`, MAIN_IMAGE_01, MAIN_IMAGE_02, MAIN_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_01, SUB_IMAGE_02, SUB_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_04, SUB_IMAGE_05, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update TB_SKU
SPU_ID = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SKU_NAME = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_INTRO = #{skuIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_PRICE = #{skuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SKU_CODE = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_BARCODE = #{skuBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_STOCK = #{skuStock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SKU_UNIT = #{skuUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SKU_UNIT_NAME = #{skuUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VIP_PRICE = #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IMAGE_01 = #{mainImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IMAGE_02 = #{mainImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IMAGE_03 = #{mainImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_01 = #{subImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_02 = #{subImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_03 = #{subImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_04 = #{subImage04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_05 = #{subImage05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = now()
where SKU_ID = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update TB_SKU set SPU_ID = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SKU_NAME = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU_INTRO = #{skuIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU_PRICE = #{skuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SKU_CODE = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU_BARCODE = #{skuBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU_STOCK = #{skuStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SKU_UNIT = #{skuUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SKU_UNIT_NAME = #{skuUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VIP_PRICE = #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_IMAGE_01 = #{mainImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_IMAGE_02 = #{mainImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_IMAGE_03 = #{mainImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_01 = #{subImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_02 = #{subImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_03 = #{subImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_04 = #{subImage04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_05 = #{subImage05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SKU_ID = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.SKU_ID ,T1.SPU_ID ,(SELECT A1.SPU_NAME FROM TB_SPU A1 WHERE A1.SPU_ID = T1.SPU_ID) AS SPU_NAME ,T1.SKU_NAME ,T1.SKU_INTRO ,T1.SKU_PRICE ,T1.SKU_CODE ,T1.SKU_BARCODE ,T1.SKU_STOCK ,T1.SKU_UNIT ,T1.SKU_UNIT_NAME ,T1.PRICE ,T1.VIP_PRICE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_01 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_02 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_01 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_02 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_04 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_05 ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU T1

SELECT T1.SKU_ID ,T1.SPU_ID ,(SELECT A1.SPU_NAME FROM TB_SPU A1 WHERE A1.SPU_ID = T1.SPU_ID) AS SPU_NAME ,T1.SKU_NAME ,T1.SKU_INTRO ,T1.SKU_PRICE ,T1.SKU_CODE ,T1.SKU_BARCODE ,T1.SKU_STOCK ,T1.SKU_UNIT ,T1.SKU_UNIT_NAME ,T1.PRICE ,T1.VIP_PRICE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_01 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_02 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_01 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_02 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_04 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_05 ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU T1 WHERE T1.SKU_ID = #{skuId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.SKU_ID ,T1.SPU_ID ,T1.SKU_NAME ,T1.SKU_INTRO ,T1.SKU_PRICE ,T1.SKU_CODE ,T1.SKU_BARCODE ,T1.SKU_STOCK ,T1.SKU_UNIT ,T1.SKU_UNIT_NAME ,T1.PRICE ,T1.VIP_PRICE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_01 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_02 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_01 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_02 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_04 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_05 ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU T1 WHERE T1.SPU_ID = #{spuId}
